title: What to do with the interest money from a bank account? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: from finland she says that she had a current account and she thought that this was interest-free only to discover a couple of years later that they've added interest to her account she closed the account i would have advised her before doing this not to close it and to keep it and what her mother is doing is the right thing whatever interest they put against your will in your account you get a bank statement at the end of the month and you can see the interest take it and give it to the poor and needy muslims and you can still use that account
